name: Moonsoul
description:
Description

The soul of the Moon has been stolen and imprisoned. Guide it to freedom!

Instructions

Directional keys to move. O key to dash. While dashing, you are invulnerable to spikes and can smash some things.  Enter to pause and access the menu.

Credits

This was a solo project by me in 2018. You can follow me at https://twitter.com/Remagamer1 if you are so inclined.
